question: How many of the following sentences are semantically reasonable? (1) This chocolate is too sour, and it's absolutely my favorite. (2) The stir-fried meat with chili peppers is extremely spicy, making people sweat profusely after eating. (3) The saltiness of this lemonade is just right, and it's very thirst-quenching. (4) This sour plum drink has an intense tartness,  and it's truly memorable.

How many of the following sentences are semantically reasonable? (1) I like to pour vinegar into stir-fries to add a touch of sourness. (2) This sausage is extremely bitter, which is a blessing for salt lovers. (3) I made a tomato salad today, and the sweet and sour taste is very refreshing. (4) The spiciness of this Sichuan hot pot is really stimulating, making it irresistible.

How many of the following sentences are semantically reasonable? (1) The cake he made is too sweet, with sweetness filling your mouth in just one bite. (2) The sweet and salty balance in this orange juice is perfect, making it very refreshing. (3) The sourness of these spicy crayfish is enough to make your tongue burn. (4) The combination of saltiness and aroma in these roasted chicken wings is truly delicious.

How many of the following sentences are semantically reasonable? (1) Some vinegar was added to this noodle dish, making the sourness just right and enriching the flavor. (2) This cake is very sweet, reminiscent of childhood flavors. (3) This strawberry yogurt has a sweet and tangy taste, and one bite brings joy to your mood. (4) The coating of this fried chicken is slightly salty, but the meat is tender and smooth.

How many of the following sentences are semantically reasonable? (1) The saltiness and spiciness of this curry complement each other perfectly, creating a rich flavor profile. (2) The bitterness and sweetness of this matcha cake interweave, making it quite unique. (3) The sweet taste of the sour-spicy rice noodles is irresistible. (4) The saltiness of this grilled meat combines with the smoky aroma from charcoal fire, resulting in an excellent taste.

How many of the following sentences are semantically reasonable? (1) This coffee has an intense salty taste, perfect for morning refreshment. (2) This apple juice has a strong bitter taste, making it very enjoyable to drink. (3) This grapefruit juice has a refreshing sourness with a hint of bitterness. (4) The sour and spicy flavors in the boiled fish with Sichuan pickles complement each other perfectly, making it very appetizing.

How many of the following sentences are semantically reasonable? (1) The sour taste of these vinegar-stir-fried shredded potatoes is a bit strong, but it's appetizing. (2) The mixture of bitter and salty tastes in this coffee ice cream is particularly rich. (3) The bitterness of this lemon tea is refreshing, and it feels cool with just one sip. (4) These roasted chicken wings have just the right amount of saltiness, with a crispy skin and tender inside.

How many of the following sentences are semantically reasonable? (1) This orange is very sweet with abundant juice, making you feel blissful with every bite. (2) The sourness and bitterness of this lemon cake complement each other perfectly, creating an excellent mouthfeel. (3) The spiciness and sourness of these pickled pepper chicken feet blend together, creating a unique flavor profile. (4) This kimchi has an intense sour taste that makes you reach for water after one bite.

How many of the following sentences are semantically reasonable? (1) The bitterness and fresh aroma of this green tea interweave, leaving a lingering aftertaste. (2) The sweet and sour taste of these sweet and sour spare ribs makes one want to take a few more bites. (3) The savory and sweet flavors of this peanut butter blend together, making each bite particularly satisfying. (4) The bitterness and garlic aroma of this cold cucumber dish stimulates one's appetite.

How many of the following sentences are semantically reasonable? (1) This Yu-Xiang Pork has a unique combination of sour, sweet and spicy flavors, offering a rich taste experience. (2) This wasabi octopus is intensely spicy, making each bite memorable. (3) These chicken skewers have a strong sour taste, stimulating the taste buds with every bite. (4) This salt-baked chicken has a rich savory flavor, making every bite satisfying.
